overview: The events of September 11th shook the globe but during the horror a few moments of animal triumph stood out - These are the tales of those animals. the documentary Tales from Ground Zero, produced by BNNtv.com in association with Animal Planet, tells the stories of animals and their owners coping with the attacks and the aftermath. In this hour we'll go inside the K-9 Search and rescue unit of Ground Zero among other stories.
title: Tales from Ground Zero
